headline: Jim Cramer Calls AMD a “Semi-Meaningful Competitor” to NVIDIA
summary: Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD) is one of the 13 stocks Jim Cramer recently shed light on. During the episode, Cramer called the stock a “semi-meaningful competitor” to NVIDIA. He said: “Lately though, we’ve been seeing AMD, their only semi-meaningful competitor; stock’s up like 40 straight points, win[s] a lot of business. Same with Cisco, […]

headline: The tech rally is about a lot more than Magnificent 7 right now
summary: Nvidia is the only member of the "Magnificent Seven" stocks among the top 20 best performers in the S&P 500 since the market bottomed on April 8.

headline: HSBC Raises Price Target on Broadcom (AVGO) to $400 From $240, Upgrades it to Buy
summary: Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ:AVGO) is one of the 13 Best Long Term Growth Stocks to Invest in Right Now. On June 24, HSBC made a notable improvement in its price target for Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ:AVGO), nearly doubling it from $240 to $400. Analyst Frank Lee upgraded the stock to Buy, expressing bullish sentiments for the company’s AI […]
